stringTable.string:
Specifies the server to use both as a controller for the agent, and as a recipient for task execution output. If the given value start with http:// or https://, it is assumed to be an URL, and used directly. Otherwise, it is assumed to be an hostname, and interpreted as http://hostname/inventory. Multiple values can be specified, using a comma as a separator.
Warning: Using multiple targets implies multiple executions of the same inventory; this is not just a matter of targets. This can lead to different results, see Multiple execution targets.
Specifies the network port to use for the embedded web interface. The default is 62354.
Disables server SSL certificate validation. The default is false.
Embedded web interface, used to receive execution requests from the GLPI server or serve httpd plugins. The default is Enabled.
Specifies the network interface to use for the embedded web interface. The default is 0.0.0.0 to use all available ones.
